EmailTemplate.name: New Cede Document Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: New Cede Document Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Please verify the cede agreement for {!Account.Name} to ensure an up-to-date agreement is in place upon renewal. UW will not release renewals or quotes unless the account as an active cede document in place. Should a new cede document need to be obtained, please initiate a request to obtain an updated cede document
